title: PBE Client help?
body: just got pbe, and i waited ~5 hours for entire thing to load up and say "launch". i get in and have 0 of everything, so like the pbe faq says, i relog. however, i open the client again and now i have to wait 5 hours again for the entire thing to patch up?

replies.body: It can take about a day for your balance to adjust.  Playing a game might do it as well!  Just hang tight for now, and it will come on its own!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EgJ16AYv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-16T21:44:06.652+0000)
>
> It can take about a day for your balance to adjust.  Playing a game might do it as well!  Just hang tight for now, and it will come on its own!

Aw okay! It works now :D
